title: Raymundo Turns Down Dream Job +  What Do 38% Of Us Claim To "Never" Do Online? + Bobby’s Mailbag: Woman Finds Husband’s Flirty Texts
itunes:title: Raymundo Turns Down Dream Job +  What Do 38% Of Us Claim To "Never" Do Online? + Bobby’s Mailbag: Woman Finds Husband’s Flirty Texts
description:
Raymundo use to be a public announcer and we thought we found the perfect dream job for him working for the Tennessee Titans…but he reveals why he shut it down. We play a round of Never Gonna Get It: 38 percent of Americans claim they "never" do this on social media! In Bobby’s mailbag, a wife found some flirty texts in her husband’s phone that appear to be with a client.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
